Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.character

Record Class ActionVisitor

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.ingsw.model.character.ActionVisitor
public record ActionVisitor(TurnManager turn, Game game, CharacterCard chosen) extends Record
This class is used to access characters data in order to build and execute their action.
